summary: Archibald has managed to get his physical form back into Skyrim at your call. Learn his call and he will come to your aid during battles for a duration of fifteen minutes.
descriptionHtml:
Archibald has managed to get his physical form back into Skyrim at your call. Learn his call and he will come to your aid
during battles for a duration of fifteen minutes. He is stronger than a normal wolf and slightly bigger. If he dies, you can
simply summon him again. [color=#00ff00][size=4]The spell tome and letter can be found in the Hall of the Dead in Whiterun,[/size][/color] next to the bench just inside
the door. It should be set to player ownership, so no having to steal this one. He is a higher leveled summon, so he is [size=2]labeled[/size] as expert,
but only takes about a 100 magicka.

Note: He can fast travel with you, but he cannot follow you through loading screens, such as going through a door. The base texture is a contrast-enhanced red wolf texture, but I drew the gore and blue.

Warning: this character does contain gore, can make a gore-less version if wanted.
author: -GladnxofxBakerStreet
